name: Death Race (itch) (Haiyoooo)
description:
Prototype racing game. Three types

DRAG RACE (VANILLA)

  • SPACE: Accelerate
  • B: Brake
  • Cross the finish line!

--------------------------------

DEATH RACE (CRAZY)

  • SPACE: Accelerate
  • R : Reverse
  • Aim for the green zone!
  • Randomized car models

------------------

SPECIAL VERSION: SNAIL

  • Click: Accelerate

Team: solo project
Engine: Processing, Java
